<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Core Rejuvenation](/Feats.aspx?ID=3107) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Automaton" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=398" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 43</row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Trigger**
You have the [dying](/Conditions.aspx?ID=11) condition and are about to attempt a recovery check.

</column>

---

Your soul taps into your core's power to push against the grasp of death and allow you to recover consciousness. You're restored to 1 Hit Point, lose the dying and [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) conditions, and can act normally on this turn. You gain or increase the [wounded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=42) condition as normal when losing the dying condition in this way.

**Enhancement** Your soul can draw even more power from your core, granting you additional benefits. When you use Core Rejuvenation, you also gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to three times your level. These Hit Points remain for 1 minute.
name: Core Rejuvenation
